alert.note: Alert for East Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cameron Parish through 445 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Creole, or 7 miles west of Grand Chenier, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Creole and Rutherford Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
